page.title: 18Farming
page.content: The main feature of this area is {agriculture.}All the fields are mixed {arable.}The food for the animals (straw etc.) is either kept on the farm or sent down to{Worksop}for selling more easily.Straw on the farms is either baled and used in the{cattle yards,or sometimes it is sold from the farms or burnt.The grassland around farms are usally given to the beef cattle in April. The livestock{winter feeding}for the beef cattle are none-saleable potatoes beans,oats,and sugar beet pulp. All around most farms there are {parish boundaries,}fencing,double fencing and mainly{tree plantation etc... Every farm in our area is 125-200ft above sea level. Trees and shrubs have been planted all around farms to separate farms and
